title: Forecast Campaign Reach
description: A media planner needs to forecast the potential reach of a Facebook campaign with a given budget and target audience.

tasks.description: Define the target audience and budget in Facebook's planning tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inputs the correct targeting and budget parameters.

tasks.description: Use the tool to generate an estimated daily reach and impression forecast.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the reach and impression estimates provided by the platform.

tasks.description: Incorporate this forecast into the overall media plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds the reach forecast to the media planning document.
